tracks.text: Clocks flicker on a television, then cut to a blond man with his mouth open.
In an arid valley with desert grasses, a brunette woman walks. She wears white bandages wrapped around her body.
Backlit by the desert sun, the woman leaps in the air.
The woman stares at us in the valley. She looks around among branches.
She gestures to us from brambles.
She crouches on cracked earth. She prowls through the arid valley.
She does tai chi. She sun bathes.
On the TV, a blond man in a hoodie stares at us, singing.
She rolls around on the cracked earth.
He sings through the TV.
At night, she looks around in the brambles, a bright light to her side.
She writhes in the sand in front of a powerful lamp.
In the sand, she crouches in front of the TV. He sings in black and white.
She dances. She holds the TV while he looks down.
She tosses sand in the air.
On her knees, she rubs the top of her head against the TV as he sings.
She finds a cable in the sand and eagerly runs it through her hands.
She jerks forward.
He stands in the cracked earth, the sun hovering near the horizon behind him.
She finds the end of the cable, which looks like a funnel.
She looks up, and a figure stands in the shadows, looking down at her.
In the cracked earth, he makes jerky, robotic motions.
As he moves, the sun appears and disappears around his body.
At night, she looks up, and stumbles back. The figure bends down.
The figure is the blond man, wearing dark clothes. He picks up the cable, staring at her.
He holds the funnel and brings it near. She flickers away.
She beats 3 times from inside the TV. He watches, bent over the screen.
He crawls in the sand, singing to us. Behind him, she sings from the TV.
He stands, facing forward, standing next to the TV. She faces down and away.
She drops off the bottom of the TV screen.
We travel through an arid valley, a 2 lane road beneath us.
In the sand, he kneels next to the TV. She presses her hands to the screen.
He looks at her in the TV.
He walks down the 2 lane road, singing. He has short blond hair, and he wears a black suit jacket, black shirt, dark jeans, and white sneakers.
He walks across the cracked earth.
She sings on the TV
He looks at us, singing, walking towards us along the road.
He lies in the sand at daylight.
At night, he crouches in the sand, while she sings on the TV.
In low light, he walks through brambles.
He sings to her in the TV, his face reflected in the screen. She looks away.
He lowers his head. She looks at him.
He lies in the earth.
A city at night, seen from far away. Lights move along a highway.
He walks in the valley.
From the TV, she looks to the side, towards the lamp.
Cut to black.
